document.full_text: as the endgame begins, both rival bidders -- deutsche borse and nasdaq and its partner, the intercontinentalexchange -- are preparing for the nyse euronext shareholders meeting in july.
document.title: handicapping the battle over nyse euronext
lines_and_colors: as the endgame begins, both rival bidders -- deutsche borse and nasdaq and its partner, the intercontinentalexchange -- are preparing for the nyse euronext shareholders meeting in july.
